name: Rhapsody Breakfast Table
description: Inspired by the original Rhapsody lamp, by her fiancée Patrick Coard Paris, Kifu Paris designs a sculptural breakfast table as an ode to his iconic lighting collection. The tabletop is inlaid in cream shagreen and sits on a cluster of 4 bronze-patina brass "rhapsody" legs that are a mixture of solid and cut-out shapes.
